channel.title: Pickup command help

item.title: Pickup command help
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“cj_howat@hotmail.com, post:8, topic:280620”] Yes this is a year too late, but for a project Czar to update the pickup commands , best way is to use this 1 nd you should get no errors lol just open client.java hit control F , Search "master and paste this above it

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
}
}[/quote]

Really? This thread is a year old.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command help
item.dc:creator: @cj_howat cj_howat@hotmail.com
item.description:
@cj_howat wrote:

Yes this is a year too late, but for a project Czar to update the pickup commands , best way is to use this 1 nd you should get no errors lol just open client.java hit control F , Search "master and paste this above it

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
}
}

item.title: Pickup command help
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Try this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command help
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Use this code

if (cmd.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong syntax! use as ::pickup 00995 10"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command help
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

I need some help with my Pickup command
This is what it is

[code]public void customCommand(String cmd) {

else if (cmd.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong syntax! use as ::pickup 00995 10”);
}
}[/code]

Im using U_Rune_Server_Base
It’s based on Project Czar.

And this is my error

Please help!
im wondering if i have to add a statement? If so, where do i add it and what should it be?

Read full topic
